description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter Chocolate Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, fit a piping bag with a 13mm star nozzle. Add half of the reserved frosting to the bag, placing it towards one side. Stir 2 tbs of cocoa into remaining frosting. Spoon into bag opposite the plain frosting. Pipe swirls on top of cake. Top each swirl with a pretzel.
